tool.name: Generate uep outputs (pm-uep-opt)
tool.command: pip show pymuon-suite || ( git clone https://github.com/muon-spectroscopy-computational-project/pymuon-suite /tmp/pymuon-suite && pip install /tmp/pymuon-suite && rm -rf /tmp/pymuon-suite) && unzip $folder && if test -f "params.yaml"; then echo "params.yaml present"; else echo "params.yaml missing" && exit 64; fi && if test -f "input.cell"; then echo "input.cell present"; else echo "input.cell missing" && exit 64; fi && cp $charge_density $charge_density.name && cp $castep_log $castep_log.name && out_folder="`python ${__tool_directory__}/get_out_folder.py`" && find \$out_folder -type f -name "*.yaml" | xargs sed -i "s#^chden_path: .*#chden_path: .\/#g" && bash ${__tool_directory__}/run.sh \$out_folder && zip -r out_zip.zip \$out_folder params.yaml input.cell && find \$out_folder > tree.txt
tool.help:
usage: pm-uep-opt [-h] [-t {r,w}] structures parameter_file
Given some input muonated structures, applies UEP optimization to refine them.
